Unversioned
===========
- First release basic framework, navigation & scoring

v1.0
====
- MEM-53 Keep user's place on the "View Crawl Data" page
- MEM-69 Add Scraping Support
- MEM-63 Users should be able to view hosts marked with "X"
- MEM-62 Handling of non-standard hosts
- MEM-59 Autocomplete tags for user
